name: e52
description: Welcome to the E52 Reality project! This is a full-stack web application for designing and simulating immersive VR motion experiences.

scripts.quality:fix: npm run quality:fix:backend && npm run quality:fix:frontend
scripts.quality:fix:backend: cd backend && npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.quality:fix:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
